title: Why does my HUAWEI MediaPad X1 7.0 constantly crash?
answer:
If you install applications that have not passed the Google compatibility test on your HUAWEI MediaPad X1 7.0, the system may be unstable or even crash.

 

It is recommended that you download applications only from the Play Store.

If your HUAWEI MediaPad X1 7.0 is experiencing frequent crashes, perform a hard restart by pressing and holding the power button for about 13 seconds.
